body_html:
FWIW, I applied the following patch and then rebuilt tensorflow and the problem went away.

diff --git a/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl b/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
index 301b59a20d..41d9430dd0 100644
--- a/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
+++ b/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
@@ -1398,7 +1398,7 @@ def _append_init_to_versionscript_impl(ctx):
       template=ctx.file.template_file,
       output=ctx.outputs.versionscript,
       substitutions={
-        "global:":"global:\n     init_%s;\n     PyInit_*;"%(mod_name),
+        "global:":"global:\n     init_%s;\n     _init_%s;\n     PyInit_*;\n     _PyInit_*;"%(mod_name, mod_name),
       },
       is_executable=False,
     )
@@ -1407,7 +1407,7 @@ def _append_init_to_versionscript_impl(ctx):
       template=ctx.file.template_file,
       output=ctx.outputs.versionscript,
       substitutions={
-        "*tensorflow*":"*tensorflow*\ninit_%s\nPyInit_*\n"%(mod_name),
+        "*tensorflow*":"*tensorflow*\ninit_%s\n_init_%s\nPyInit_*\n_PyInit_*\n"%(mod_name, mod_name),
       },
       is_executable=False,
     )
--
body_text:
FWIW, I applied the following patch and then rebuilt tensorflow and the problem went away.
diff --git a/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl b/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
index 301b59a20d..41d9430dd0 100644
--- a/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
+++ b/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
@@ -1398,7 +1398,7 @@ def _append_init_to_versionscript_impl(ctx):
       template=ctx.file.template_file,
       output=ctx.outputs.versionscript,
       substitutions={
-        "global:":"global:\n     init_%s;\n     PyInit_*;"%(mod_name),
+        "global:":"global:\n     init_%s;\n     _init_%s;\n     PyInit_*;\n     _PyInit_*;"%(mod_name, mod_name),
       },
       is_executable=False,
     )
@@ -1407,7 +1407,7 @@ def _append_init_to_versionscript_impl(ctx):
       template=ctx.file.template_file,
       output=ctx.outputs.versionscript,
       substitutions={
-        "*tensorflow*":"*tensorflow*\ninit_%s\nPyInit_*\n"%(mod_name),
+        "*tensorflow*":"*tensorflow*\ninit_%s\n_init_%s\nPyInit_*\n_PyInit_*\n"%(mod_name, mod_name),
       },
       is_executable=False,
     )
--
body:
FWIW, I applied the following patch and then rebuilt tensorflow and the problem went away.

```patch
diff --git a/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl b/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
index 301b59a20d..41d9430dd0 100644
--- a/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
+++ b/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl
@@ -1398,7 +1398,7 @@ def _append_init_to_versionscript_impl(ctx):
       template=ctx.file.template_file,
       output=ctx.outputs.versionscript,
       substitutions={
-        "global:":"global:\n     init_%s;\n     PyInit_*;"%(mod_name),
+        "global:":"global:\n     init_%s;\n     _init_%s;\n     PyInit_*;\n     _PyInit_*;"%(mod_name, mod_name),
       },
       is_executable=False,
     )
@@ -1407,7 +1407,7 @@ def _append_init_to_versionscript_impl(ctx):
       template=ctx.file.template_file,
       output=ctx.outputs.versionscript,
       substitutions={
-        "*tensorflow*":"*tensorflow*\ninit_%s\nPyInit_*\n"%(mod_name),
+        "*tensorflow*":"*tensorflow*\ninit_%s\n_init_%s\nPyInit_*\n_PyInit_*\n"%(mod_name, mod_name),
       },
       is_executable=False,
     )
--
```
